parameters.name: start
parameters.value: ={{ { dateTime: $('Workflow Input').item.json.start_time, timeZone: $('Workflow Input').item.json.user_timezone || $('Get Google Auth').item.json.user_timezone || 'UTC' } }}

parameters.name: end
parameters.value: ={{ { dateTime: $('Workflow Input').item.json.end_time, timeZone: $('Workflow Input').item.json.user_timezone || $('Get Google Auth').item.json.user_timezone || 'UTC' } }}

assignments.name: error
assignments.value: =Invalid action '{{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.action }}'. Valid actions: list_events, create_event, update_event, delete_event, rsvp_event

parameters.name: start
parameters.value: ={{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.start_time ? { dateTime: $('Workflow Input').item.json.start_time, timeZone: $('Workflow Input').item.json.user_timezone || $('Get Google Auth').item.json.user_timezone || 'UTC' } : undefined }}

parameters.name: end
parameters.value: ={{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.end_time ? { dateTime: $('Workflow Input').item.json.end_time, timeZone: $('Workflow Input').item.json.user_timezone || $('Get Google Auth').item.json.user_timezone || 'UTC' } : undefined }}

assignments.name: message
assignments.value: =Successfully updated RSVP status to '{{ $('Update RSVP Status').item.json.new_status }}' for event '{{ $json.summary }}'
